channel.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
channel.description:
> # The Lord > **Neutral Killer** > > Passive 1: Professional care - If you would die you will be healed. This passive transfers if your class changes > Passive 2: Royal Blood > > Day Ability 1: Bribery - Redirect your first target to your second tonight (Unlimited) > Day Ability 2: Report - You will learn the class of anyone visiting your target tonight (3 uses) > > Night Ability 1: Hired sword - Send a minion to kill target player. If you would die from visiting them the minion will die instead. (Unlimited) > Night Ability 2: Plot - You will appear to be a Princess to investigative ability's tonight. Learn target player's class and whoever visits target player tonight. (Unlimited)
Bribery will get drunk results

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
An inquisitor who checks a heathen duchess who uses wisp will get princess for example. Even though a framed princess will still appear as a princess.

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
They bypass frames, not tailors.

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Aren’t all evils (Except the Mastermind) able to bypass frames? This is essentially an anti-frame

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
And then what will they do when it turns out that the Lord wasn’t claiming invest the whole time? He can fake Drunk too after all.

And what if it’s a possessor game and they just THINK it’s a Lord game? Ect ect ect.

The only reason I specified Princess is because scum invests need to find him as something. So if a nightwatch checked a plotting lord he would get Princess. But a Princess would just get Special/Invest and an Obs would get BD.

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

I don’t see the problem here.

It’s unfair and unbalanced to anyone else playing it, so the only response would be to just kill the Princesses until you found The Lord, if you don’t find out the NK the first few days.
“So it should just not claim Princess”
So then everyone will witch hunt literally any Special Invest class until The Lord is dead.

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
You absolutely could. I don’t see the problem here.

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
Also, why is it unlimited? While you do sacrifice killing power to gain investigative immunity, you could just use it forever and be confirmed good, which means that it could use it until it got to a state where it doesn’t matter if it used it or not. It sacrifices killing power to grant a one way ticket to a win, under certain circumstances.

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

Oops. Forgot. It’s unlimited, you’re giving up kills to use it so there shouldn’t be a problem

plots every damn night

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

It’s an NK. The goal is the same as any other NK.

And how do we know it’s goal is to just live (like the alchemist)

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
JakeTheWolfie:

No set amount of uses?

Oops. Forgot. It’s unlimited, you’re giving up kills to use it so there shouldn’t be a problem

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: JakeTheWolfie
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

Night Ability 2: Plot - You will appear to be a Princess to investigative ability’s tonight. Learn target player’s class and whoever visits target player tonight.

No set amount of uses?

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
The only thing an NK stricly needs is a killing ability. However that doesn’t mean that an NK can’t have ability’s that serve other purposes. For example both Possessor and Reaper possess social ability’s and Possessor in particular has an investigative aspect with possess.

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Because other NK’s have methods of bypassing protection and either bonus kills, vote manipulation or both. This one just has info and a redirect.

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: Thunal33
item.description:
This NK seems more powerful than the others because of Royal Blood, Bribery, Report, and Plot. I don’t understand why an NK would need offensive and investigative abilities anyway.

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
It’s an NK. The goal is the same as any other NK. What I mean is that it is well suited to becoming Psycho king, and that this fact is the purpose behind it’s design.

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: James
item.description:
Sorry, I didn’t know that. The goal is missing.

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
It’s an NK designed to become psycho king. Problem?

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: James
item.description:
NK’s are supposed to kill. This does more than that. Why is an NK Royal?

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
More so than NK in general or Reaper CoD in particular?

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: James
item.description:
This looks swingy.

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Problem?

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
Magnus:

So you can only be lynched?

Healing has bypass methods. Prince, Enforcer and CW come to mind

Magnus:

Psycho king?

Ye

Magnus:

Unneeded for a NK.

Technically so is silence, the whisper reading on poss’s ability ect. It isn’t needed on NK in general but it IS needed for this NK in particular.

Magnus:

Unneeded with the healing from attack passive. What does observer see?

Knight bypasses healing (for some reason). Obs sees nothing.

Magnus:

Why princess?

Cuz she’s the only BD royal invest. And it needs to be a specific class because of Nightwatch, Marshal and Handmaiden.

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: Magnus
item.description:
NuclearBurrito:

Passive 1: Professional care - If you would die you will be healed. This passive transfers if your class changes

So you can only be lynched?

NuclearBurrito:

Passive 2: Royal Blood

Psycho king?

NuclearBurrito:

Day Ability 1: Bribery - Redirect your first target to your second tonight (Unlimited)
Day Ability 2: Report - You will learn the class of anyone visiting your target tonight (3 uses)

Unneeded for a NK.

NuclearBurrito:

Night Ability 1: Hired sword - Send a minion to kill target player. If you would die from visiting them the minion will die instead. (Unlimited)

Unneeded with the healing from attack passive. What does observer see?

NuclearBurrito:

Night Ability 2: Plot - You will appear to be a Princess to investigative ability’s tonight. Learn target player’s class and whoever visits target player tonight.

Why princess?

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: James
item.description:
Uhh…

Read full topic

item.title: The Lord - Neutral Killer
item.dc:creator: NuclearBurrito
item.description:
The Lord

Neutral Killer

Passive 1: Professional care - If you would die you will be healed. This passive transfers if your class changes
Passive 2: Royal Blood

Day Ability 1: Bribery - Redirect your first target to your second tonight (Unlimited)
Day Ability 2: Report - You will learn the class of anyone visiting your target tonight (3 uses)

Night Ability 1: Hired sword - Send a minion to kill target player. If you would die from visiting them the minion will die instead. (Unlimited)
Night Ability 2: Plot - You will appear to be a Princess to investigative ability’s tonight. Learn target player’s class and whoever visits target player tonight. (Unlimited)

Bribery will get drunk results

Read full topic
